message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.GR, cs.MM 

This paper deals with the problem of removing reflections from images, which is a common task in computer vision. The proposed method uses a deep learning network and is trained on a new dataset of reflection images. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of a human perception inspired loss function, which suggests a focus on the interpretability of the model, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) another likely category. The paper also mentions the integration of multi-scale gradient information, which is a common technique in machine learning, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) a possible category. The use of a new dataset and the focus on real-world scenes suggest a possible category of cs.GR (Graphics), and the use of image processing techniques suggests a possible category of cs.MM (Multimedia).
